languages.text: "Мне не нужен клинок, который юлит и играет со мной. Запомни это".
"I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
languages.original_text: "Мне не нужен клинок, который юлит и играет со мной. Запомни это".

traits.locale_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
"I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
"I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
"I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
"I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
"I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."

languages.text: «Un arma que intenta engañarme y jugar conmigo no me sirve de nada. Recuérdelo».
languages.original_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."

traits.locale_text: «Un arma que intenta engañarme y jugar conmigo no me sirve de nada. Recuérdelo».

languages.text: 「私を欺き、翻弄しようとするような刃に用はない。覚えておけ」
languages.original_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."

traits.locale_text: 「私を欺き、翻弄しようとするような刃に用はない。覚えておけ」

languages.text: “我不需要打算欺骗我、玩弄我的利刃，记住这一点。”
languages.original_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."

traits.locale_text: “我不需要打算欺骗我、玩弄我的利刃，记住这一点。”

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Verwendung für eine Klinge, die mich täuschen und mit mir spielen will. Merkt Euch das."
languages.original_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Verwendung für eine Klinge, die mich täuschen und mit mir spielen will. Merkt Euch das."

languages.text: « Je n'ai que faire d'une lame qui chercherait à me berner et à jouer avec moi. Ne l'oubliez pas. »
languages.original_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai que faire d'une lame qui chercherait à me berner et à jouer avec moi. Ne l'oubliez pas. »

languages.text: "Beni kandırıp parmağında oynatmaya çalışan bir kılıca ihtiyacım yok. Bunu aklından çıkarma."
languages.original_text: "I have no use for a blade that tries to deceive and toy with me. Remember that."
